release_notes.en-US:
- possibility to add public key to contacts (big thanks to Patrick Brunschwig)
- possibility to disable the display name auto generation
- birthday events are now recurring
- category added (for new users) to birthday events
- new toolbar buttons for adding events and tasks
- preview of the address formula result in configuration
- preview of the display name formula result in address book properties
- fix for LDAP autocomplete and Thunderbird 78.5.1
- a circle for AB accounts color

release_notes.en-US:
- email validation button (essentially for converting in lowercase) 
- fix for unsupported fields types in edition
- when nothing changed after a contact edition, nothing is saved
- merge dialog : support of contact events and 4.0 fields
- merge dialog : support of lists
- birthday title : support of card name
- possibility to go to next|previous contact in edition
- full support of message window
- pl translation completed (big thanks to SecretOfSteel)
- fix display column name for identities
